IOBiConsumer<T,U> - Interface in io.codecastle.scriptorium.function
Represents an operation that accepts two input arguments and returns no result, possibly throwing an IOException.

IOFunction<T,R> - Interface in io.codecastle.scriptorium.function
Represents a function that accepts one argument and returns a result, possibly throwing an IOException.
